body.name: Iron (Hades Abyss MC 11): A Dixie Reapers Bad Boys Romance

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Iron and Nari
reviews.reviewText: Nari didn’t have a great life. Her father was abusive and the only way to survive was to run. Didn’t turn out so hot till a biker came along and brought her to Hades Abyss. Iron aka Jack was stunned. He couldn’t believe that this little woman could endure so much and yet she held on. Something just clicked within him and he knew she was the one. I love that Nari is Korean. YEAH!!! So now we get to add that culture to the mix. And yep, being Korean, I do the shoes off too. It just keeps things cleaner. But that is me. Nari suffered so much from her father. I was so shocked to read how he treated her. I guess I didn’t expect it. And then you have Iron. He was a bit of a jerk in the last book. But I guess he just needed to settle down and find a place for himself. He needed stability and a reason. Nari gives him that and more. I can’t believe that they all had a hand in it. Crazy. I loved this book. I wonder if we will find someone for Marauder. Nora perhaps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: HW is making life very difficult for me! She keeps putting out the best heroes so I keep having to change my favorite! Iron isn't known for being sweet but he pulls out all the stops for Nari. He doesn't hesitate to put her first, making her feel safe and comfortable. Nari's life has been literally garbage for as long as she can recall. No one has been as kind and caring, loving and supportive as Iron. His presence in her life brings her a family. His sister and his dad immediately welcome her with open arms and my heart just melted. The sweet revenge the club gets for Nari is brutal but very much deserved. Just wonderful!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really enjoyed this!
reviews.reviewText: Nari has a very hard life and after leaving another abusive situation she ends up with Hades Abyss. Iron sees her almost immediately and knows she's his. He is incredible with her and gives her the family and confidence she always should've had. Her family are just the worst kind of people, abusive and cruel to so many. This book has some dark elements that center around abuse in all its forms and violence. I'm looking forward to whoever is next!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Nari life is filled with pain and humiliation from her own family. She runs thinking life on the streets would be better. It wasn’t just more pain and humiliation. She runs when she encounters Crow to delivers her to Hades Abyss in MS. Iron is there when Titan and Kraken get to the gate and take her in. He knows she’s his and they along with the club will take down the people who hurt her.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like Iron and Nari. They're so cute together. Here is yhis big hardened biker, and who does he fall for? This five foot cute woman is afraid of her own shadow. Her home life was bad. She never had any chance of having a normal one. But she made the best of her situation as much as she could. I was surprised Iron fell that fast because of how he is. You can see both were made for each other.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A deeply emotional, heart pounding romance that will break you apart before slowly piecing you back together again. Iron an Nari are two people who are clearly meant to be together. Their instant connection is absolutely adorable and heartwarming. This hard, gruff and surly man falls for a little meek woman and it’s beautiful. I loved going on this ride with them and the Hades Abyss MC.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Another winner in this series. Good characters and storyline along with some good twists and turns plus suspense and action. Emotional pain and grow. Very enjoyable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This book was very good. Loved Iron and the MC . All of the books in the series are very good

What a great book and series!!! Harley has delivered yet another awesome book!! I just absolutely loved it from beginning to end and I can't wait to read the next one! A definite must read! Happy Reading!!! :)
Harley Wylde is one of my top go to authors. Ioved the main characters they had amazing chemistry and the storyline had a bit of everything...action,suspense and a whole lot of love
